caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
I was looking at this about two weeks ago after Canonical's CEO Mark Shuttleworth keynote at OpenStack conference. Some notes:
- I don't know if you can use this to deploy all this software on one machine, or some software on a machine and some on another. I'm trying to figure out if you can use it for smaller scale.
- I checked out the playground and it's pretty cool, but I found only few diagrams and few software that can be used. 

Maybe I'm missing something, but I think it didn't take off yet. I hope it does, and I hope it can be used for smaller scale.

Juju has been there for a while, way before the keynote :)

I don't know anyone who uses it in production though, so I am with you that it didn't take of yet
